name: Artist's Curse
description:
Artist's Curse is a narrative game created for KenneyJam 2020 under the theme 'Cursed'. Games created for this Jam are restricted to using only KenneyNL assets.

Artist's Curse is a game which explores the game development process, and shows how attached developers can get to their own creations, but also feel that their creations are never good enough.

Best Experienced in Full Screen

Known Bugs:

  • Known to not work in some Firefox browsers, try using Chrome if it doesn't work.
  • You can moonjump in the platforming section, try not to.
  • If you get stuck while driving, just keep driving, you should respawn eventually.
